ðŸ’¡ gpupixel | C++
ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: Enabling real-time image and video processing with advanced filters on various platforms, particularly for mobile applications requiring beauty effects.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Real-time image and video filtering â€¢ Cross-platform compatibility (iOS, Android, Mac, Win, Linux) â€¢ C++11 and OpenGL/ES based â€¢ Beauty filters and face manipulation â€¢ Small footprint
ðŸ“– Summary: GPUPixel is a high-performance, cross-platform C++ library for real-time image and video filtering. It leverages OpenGL/ES to provide a wide range of effects, including beauty filters, and is compatible with iOS, Android, Mac, Windows, and Linux.
ðŸ”— Links: â€¢ View Project â€¢ Homepage ================ ðŸ”“ Open Source

ðŸ’¡ MetaRadar | Kotlin
ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: Real-time monitoring and analysis of the Bluetooth Low Energy environment for security research, personal investigation, and understanding device privacy.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Scan, analyze, and track Bluetooth devices â€¢ Create flexible filters for device detection â€¢ Deep analysis of scanned BLE devices via GATT services â€¢ GATT services Explorer â€¢ Define device type by metadata
ðŸ“– Summary: MetaRadar is an Android application designed for monitoring and analyzing Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) environments. It allows users to scan for BLE devices, track their presence, analyze their GATT services, and receive real-time alerts for suspicious or trackable devices.
ðŸ”— Links: â€¢ View Project ================ ðŸ”“ Open Source

ðŸ”¥ auto-subs | TypeScript
ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: Automatically generating accurate, customizable subtitles for video and audio content, with seamless integration into professional video editing workflows like DaVinci Resolve.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ One-click installer for Windows, macOS, and Linux â€¢ Standalone mode for transcribing any audio/video file â€¢ DaVinci Resolve integration
ðŸ“– Summary: AutoSubs is a desktop application that automatically generates subtitles for audio and video files using AI. It offers both a standalone mode for any media file and integration with DaVinci Resolve, featuring a user-friendly interface, speaker diarization, and customizable subtitle styling.
ðŸ”— Links: â€¢ View Project â€¢ Homepage ================ ðŸ”“ Open Source

ðŸš€ x-ui-pro | Shell
ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: To provide an easy-to-install and highly configurable web proxy solution for bypassing internet censorship and restrictions, while offering enhanced security and obfuscation features.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Automated installation script for web proxy server â€¢ Supports WebSocket/GRPC/HttpUpgrade/XHTTP via Nginx â€¢ Multiple user and domain support on port 443 â€¢ Auto SSL renewal and daily service reloads â€¢ Automatic daily backups of x-ui.db
ðŸ“– Summary: XUI-PRO is a shell script that automates the installation and configuration of a secure web proxy server. It integrates various tools like Nginx, Xray, V2rayA, Cloudflare, and Tor to provide a robust solution for bypassing internet restrictions and enhancing network security.
ðŸ”— Links: â€¢ View Project ================ ðŸ”“ Open Source

ðŸš€ persepolis | Python
ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: Efficiently managing and accelerating file downloads through a graphical user interface.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Multi-segment downloading (up to 64 connections) â€¢ Download scheduling â€¢ Download queuing â€¢ Downloading videos from YouTube and other platforms â€¢ Cross-platform compatibility (GNU/Linux, BSD, macOS, Windows)
ðŸ“– Summary: Persepolis is a free and open-source download manager written in Python, designed for multiple operating systems including GNU/Linux, BSD, macOS, and Windows. It offers advanced features for efficient file downloading.
ðŸ”— Links: â€¢ View Project â€¢ Homepage ================ ðŸ”“ Open Source
